narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Facility meets the minimum requirements for a Class C Exhibitor license.
 In addition at the time of  inspection the following topics were discussed: medical records, recordkeeping, and
renewal process.
In order to complete the licensing process the applicant needs to send the fee for the appropriate number of animals
to the Animal Care office below
USDA-APHIS-AC
920 MAIN CAMPUS DRIVE 
Suite 200
Raleigh NC 27606 
919-855-7100
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
